description: Uploaded by https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/runbooks/-/jobs/6001827271 at Wed Jan 24 14:59:41 UTC 2024

targets.expr:
label_replace(
  topk by (worker) (1, sum(rate(sidekiq_running_jobs{environment="$environment", type="sidekiq", stage="$stage", worker=~"$worker"}[$__range])) by (worker, urgency)),
  "urgency", "unknown", "urgency", ""
)

label_replace(
  topk by (worker) (1, sum(rate(sidekiq_running_jobs{environment="$environment", type="sidekiq", stage="$stage", worker=~"$worker"}[$__range])) by (worker, feature_category)),
  "feature_category", "unknown", "feature_category", ""
)

label_replace(
  topk by (worker) (1, sum(rate(sidekiq_running_jobs{environment="$environment", type="sidekiq", stage="$stage", worker=~"$worker"}[$__range])) by (worker, shard)),
  "shard", "unknown", "shard", ""
)

label_replace(
  topk by (worker) (1, sum(rate(sidekiq_running_jobs{environment="$environment", type="sidekiq", stage="$stage", worker=~"$worker"}[$__range])) by (worker, external_dependencies)),
  "external_dependencies", "none", "external_dependencies", ""
)

label_replace(
  topk by (worker) (1, sum(rate(sidekiq_running_jobs{environment="$environment", type="sidekiq", stage="$stage", worker=~"$worker"}[$__range])) by (worker, boundary)),
  "boundary", "none", "boundary", ""
)

panels.description: Queue apdex monitors the percentage of jobs that are dequeued within their queue threshold. Higher is better. Different jobs have different thresholds.
panels.title: Queue Apdex

yaxes.label: % Jobs within Max Queuing Duration SLO

panels.description: Execution apdex monitors the percentage of jobs that run within their execution (run-time) threshold. Higher is better. Different jobs have different thresholds.
panels.title: Execution Apdex

yaxes.label: % Jobs within Max Execution Duration SLO

panels.description: Percentage of jobs that fail with an error. Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(clamp_max(sum by (worker) (
  (application_sli_aggregation:sidekiq_execution:error:rate_5m{environment="$environment", worker=~"$worker"} >= 0)
)
/
sum by (worker) (
  (application_sli_aggregation:sidekiq_execution:ops:rate_5m{environment="$environment", worker=~"$worker"} >= 0)
)
,1),0)

panels.title: Error Ratio

panels.description: Enqueue events separated by immediate (destined for execution) vs delayed (destined for ScheduledSet) scheduling.
panels.title: Jobs Enqueued by Schedule

panels.description: The number of unstarted jobs in a queue (capped at 1000 at scrape time for performance reasons)

targets.expr: max by (name) (max_over_time(sidekiq_enqueued_jobs{environment="$environment", name=~"$worker"}[$__interval]) and on(fqdn) (redis_connected_slaves != 0)) or on () label_replace(vector(0), "name", "$worker", "name", "")

panels.title: Queue length

panels.content: * [📈 Kibana: Sidekiq queue time p95 percentile latency aggregated (split by worker)](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=AWNABDRwNDuQHTm2tH6l&_a=(filters:!((meta:(index:'AWNABDRwNDuQHTm2tH6l',key:json.type.keyword,params:sidekiq,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type.keyword:(query:sidekiq,type:phrase)))),(meta:(index:'AWNABDRwNDuQHTm2tH6l',key:json.class.keyword,params:'${worker:regex}',type:custom),query:(regexp:(json.class.keyword:'${worker:regex}')))),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(field:json.scheduling_latency_s,percents:!(95)),schema:metric,type:percentiles),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.time,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram),(enabled:!t,id:'3',params:(field:json.class.keyword,missingBucket:!f,missingBucketLabel:Missing,order:desc,orderAgg:(enabled:!t,id:'3-orderAgg',params:(field:json.scheduling_latency_s),schema:orderAgg,type:sum),orderBy:custom,otherBucket:!t,otherBucketLabel:Other,size:5),schema:group,type:terms)),params:(valueAxes:!((id:'ValueAxis-1',labels:(filter:!t,rotate:0,show:!t,truncate:100),name:'LeftAxis-1',position:left,scale:(mode:normal,type:linear),show:!t,style:(),title:(text:'p95+Request+Duration:+json.scheduling_latency_s'),type:value)))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
panels.description: Estimated queue time, between when the job is enqueued and executed. Lower is better.
panels.title: Queue Time - time spend queueing

panels.content: * [📈 Kibana: Sidekiq execution time p95 percentile latency aggregated (split by worker)](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=AWNABDRwNDuQHTm2tH6l&_a=(filters:!((meta:(index:'AWNABDRwNDuQHTm2tH6l',key:json.type.keyword,params:sidekiq,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type.keyword:(query:sidekiq,type:phrase)))),(meta:(index:'AWNABDRwNDuQHTm2tH6l',key:json.class.keyword,params:'${worker:regex}',type:custom),query:(regexp:(json.class.keyword:'${worker:regex}')))),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(field:json.duration_s,percents:!(95)),schema:metric,type:percentiles),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.time,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram),(enabled:!t,id:'3',params:(field:json.class.keyword,missingBucket:!f,missingBucketLabel:Missing,order:desc,orderAgg:(enabled:!t,id:'3-orderAgg',params:(field:json.duration_s),schema:orderAgg,type:sum),orderBy:custom,otherBucket:!t,otherBucketLabel:Other,size:5),schema:group,type:terms)),params:(valueAxes:!((id:'ValueAxis-1',labels:(filter:!t,rotate:0,show:!t,truncate:100),name:'LeftAxis-1',position:left,scale:(mode:normal,type:linear),show:!t,style:(),title:(text:'p95+Request+Duration:+json.duration_s'),type:value)))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
panels.description: The duration, once a job starts executing, that it runs for, by shard. Lower is better.
panels.title: Individual Execution Time - time taken for individual jobs to complete
Execution RPS (the rate at which jobs are completed after dequeue)
Error Rate (the rate at which jobs fail)

panels.description: Jobs skipped (dropped/deferred) intentionally via feature flag `drop_sidekiq_jobs_<worker_name>` or `run_sidekiq_jobs_<worker_name>`
panels.title: Jobs Skipped

panels.content: Made with ❤️ and [Grafonnet](https://github.com/grafana/grafonnet-lib). [Contribute to this dashboard on GitLab.com](https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/runbooks/blob/master/dashboards)
